translations.transtext: 33. An out-of-turn meal, except at the proper occasions, is to be confessed.
๓๓. เว้นไว้แต่สมัย เป็นปาจิตตีย์ ในเพราะโภชนะทีหลัง
33. In substituting a meal for another meal for which an invitation has already been accepted earlier), there is (a case entailing) expiation unless it is the proper occasion.
